mapper.insert: INSERT INTO counsel (category_id, title, content, customer_name, customer_email, creator_id, modifier_id, created_at, modified_at) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{customerName},#{customerEmail},#{creatorId},#{modifierId} , now(), now())

INSERT INTO counsel_history (counsel_id, sequence, category_id, title, content, requestor_email, creator_id, created_at) SELECT #{id}, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM counsel_history hist WHERE hist.counsel_id = #{id}) + 1, category_id, title, content, customer_email, creator_id, modified_at FROM counsel WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, COUNT(category_id) FROM charger WHERE user_id IN ( SELECT id FROM user WHERE status = "POSSIBLE" AND role = "COUNSELOR" ) GROUP BY user_id HAVING category_id = #{category_id} ORDER BY COUNT(category_id), user_id LIMIT 1
